content: Hi I just found out that the documentation on wordpress webhooks needs updating: https://wordpress.org/plugins/hookpress/ plugin recommended its out since 2019. So maybe another plugin is needed to replace and test with.
I think https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-webhooks/ might be the thing to use instead?
One thing that's not clear to me is whether that matches the wordpress.com interface, or whether one needs two: https://wordpress.com/support/webhooks/
I have a vague collection that Wordpress doesn't have webhooks built-in because it's an upsell on the wordpress.com hosting service.
